info.title: PMCU Backend
info.description: this is a desc hello world

post.description: Creates a new user in the system. The user will be assigned an ID automatically. This can be found in the response.

get.description: Get all users in the system.

put.description: Send the keys that you'd like to update, this can be one or more of `firstName`, `lastName` and `password`.

delete.description: Deletes a user from the system by `id`.

example.reference: Nostrum ut blanditiis explicabo aliquid nesciunt.
